mapper.select: select a.account_num, a.account_name, a.account_login, r.room_num from room r, account a where a.account_num = r.account_num and room_num in(select room_num from room where account_num = #{account_num}) and r.account_num != #{account_num}
select /*+INDEX(chat_index_pk)*/ account_num, admin_num, chat_history, to_char(chat_date,'YYYY-MM-DD:HH24:MI:SS') from chat where room_num = #{room_num}
mapper.insert: insert into chat(chat_index, room_num, account_num, admin_num,chat_history,chat_date) values(chat_index_seq.nextval , #{room_num}, #{account_num}, #{admin_num},#{chat_history}, sysdate)
